    public class GSYSurfaceView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
implements android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback2, IGSYRenderView, MeasureHelper.MeasureFormVideoParamsListener

        从接口复制的说明: IGSYRenderView
        渲染view通过MeasureFormVideoParamsListener获取视频的相关参数，必须
        指定者:
        setVideoParamsListener 在接口中 IGSYRenderView
